DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QueJnlInf
DynSentence.Sentence: select RSFLD2 from afetxnjnl where LogNo='%s' AND HTxnSt IN ('S','T','U') AND RSFLD2 IN ('0001','0010','0013','3002','0049','0100','0112','0114','0241')

DynSentence.name: GetTxnJnl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT * FROM afetxnjnl WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND HTxnSt='S'

DynSentence.name: Cnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) OrnCnt, SUM(CAST(TxnAmt As BIGINT)) OrnAmt FROM afetxnjnl WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND HTxnSt='S'

DynSentence.name: GetTxnJnl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT * FROM afetxnjnl WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND HTxnSt='S'

DynSentence.name: Cnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) OrnCnt, SUM(CAST(TxnAmt As BIGINT)) OrnAmt FROM afetxnjnl WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' AND HTxnSt='S'

DynSentence.name: QryJnlInfo
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT IdNo TCusId FROM sfmcusagra WHERE BrNo='%s' AND MobTel='%s' AND Status='0'

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

Transaction.desc: 有线电视月租费查询(身份证)
有线电视月租费查询(手册号)

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: MultiQuery
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TCusID,RsFld3,TxnAmt,TckNo,CntrId,ChkTim,Rsfld2,FTxnTm from afetxnjnl WHERE ActNo='%s' and CntrId='%s' and BrNo='441999' and HTxnSt='S' order by FTxnTm DESC FETCH FIRST 20 ROWS ONLY

DynSentence.name: Cnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) SumCnt FROM afetxnjnl where ActNo ='%s' and CntrId='%s' and BrNo='441999' and HTxnSt='S'

FlowCtrl.Set: Stsxx=我行与地税系统实时联网，您在本机成功缴税后，即可办理年审。如您需要完税凭证可 在“交费易”各自助终端补打缴税凭证，交费易咨询电话：96001。

DynSentence.name: MultiQuery
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TCusID,RsFld3,TxnAmt,TckNo,CntrId,ChkTim,Rsfld2,FTxnTm from afetxnjnl WHERE ActNo='%s' and CntrId='%s' and Rsfld2='%s' and BrNo='441999' and HTxnSt='S' order by FTxnTm DESC FETCH FIRST 20 ROWS ONLY

DynSentence.name: Cnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) SumCnt FROM afetxnjnl where ActNo ='%s' and CntrId='%s' and Rsfld2='%s' and BrNo='441999' and HTxnSt='S'

DynSentence.name: QryJnlInfo
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT LogNo FROM afetxnjnl WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('S','T','U') order by LogNo asc

DynSentence.name: QryJnlInfo2
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT LogNo FROM afetxnjnl WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt='T' order by LogNo asc

DynSentence.name: QryJnlInfo1
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT Count(*) cnt FROM afetxnjnl WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('S','T','U') and HRspcd='SC0000' and ChkFlg='0'

DynSentence.name: CCSupdatesucess
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afetxnjnl SET TTxnst='S' WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and ThdChk='1'

DynSentence.name: CCSupdatefail
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE afetxnjnl SET TTxnst='F',ThdChk='1' WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and ThdChk='0'

DynSentence.name: CCSsum
DynSentence.Sentence: select count(*) as sumcnt from afetxnjnl WHERE BrNo='%s' AND CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and ThdChk='0'

DynSentence.name: YCTtk
DynSentence.Sentence: select logno from afetxnjnl where CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and ChkFlg='0' and TTXNCD='482155'

DynSentence.name: YCTtkquery
DynSentence.Sentence: select ActNo,TxnAmt,TCusNm,NodTrc,THDKEY,RsFld3,ActDat,TCUSID from afetxnjnl where CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and logno='%s'

DynSentence.name: Updatquery
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set ChkFlg='1' where CAgtNo='%s' AND ActDat='%s' and logno='%s'

DynSentence.name: YTKinsert
DynSentence.Sentence: insert into ytk_yct (select FTxnTm,ActDat,CAgtNo,ActNo,TCUSID,LogNo,TckNo,RsFld1,RSFLD2,TxnAmt,RsFld3,ThdChk, case when ThdChk='S' then 'A' else 'B' end from afetxnjnl where ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and ThdChk IN ('G','F','D','E','Y','S') and HRspcd='SC0000')

DynSentence.name: YCTinsert
DynSentence.Sentence: insert into ytk_yct (select FTxnTm,ActDat,CAgtNo,ActNo,TCUSID,LogNo,TckNo,' ',' ',TxnAmt,' ',ThdChk, case when ThdChk='Y' then 'A' else 'B' end from afetxnjnl where ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and ThdChk IN ('Y','B') and HRspcd='SC0000')

DynSentence.name: YTK_YCTdelete
DynSentence.Sentence: delete from ytk_yct where CAgtNo='%s'

If.Set: RspMsg=打开文件，更新状态失败

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TActNo, BBusTyp FROM savcrpagr WHERE CAgtNo='%s' AND SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT a.TActNo,b.CrpNam,b.STLACT FROM savcrpagr a,savcrpinf b WHERE a.CAgtNo='%s' AND a.CrpCod=b.CrpCod AND a.BrNo=b.BrNo

DynSentence.name: Updafetxnjnl
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set ChkFlg='1' WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('S','T','U') and HRspcd='SC0000' and TTxnst IN ('S','U')

DynSentence.name: UpdYCTYKafetxnjnl
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set ChkFlg='1' WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and HRspcd='SC0000' and TXNSTS='S' and THDCHK in('Y','B','0','A','D')

DynSentence.name: UpdYTKafetxnjnl
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set ChkFlg='1' WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt='S' and HRspcd='SC0000' and ThdChk IN ('G','F','D','E','Y','S','0','H','B')

DynSentence.name: Updafetxnjnl
DynSentence.Sentence: update afetxnjnl set HTxnSt='%s' WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('T','U') and LogNo='%s'

Transaction.desc: 自助通对可疑交易进行状态查询

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select ActNo,TCUSNM,TCUSID,TxnAmt from afetxnjnl WHERE ActDat ='%s' and CAgtNo='%s' and LogNo='%s' and HTxnSt IN ('T','U') and ChkFlg='0'

DynSentence.name: QryCrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(TxnAmt as bigint)) as SumAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotCnt from afetxnjnl where ActDat = '%s' and CAgtNo= '%s' and HTxnSt IN ('S','T','U') and HRspcd='SC0000' and TTxnst IN ('S','U') and ChkFlg='0'

DynSentence.name: QryLotAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(TxnAmt as bigint)) as SumAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotCnt from lshdjnl441 where substr(TraTim,1,8)='%s' and status='0'

DynSentence.name: QryCCSAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(TxnAmt as bigint)) as SumAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotCnt from afetxnjnl where ActDat = '%s' and CAgtNo= '%s' and HTxnSt='S' and ThdChk='1' and ChkFlg='0' and TTxnst='S' and HRspcd='SC0000'

DynSentence.name: QryYCTYKAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(TxnAmt as bigint)) as SumAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotCnt from afetxnjnl where ActDat = '%s' and CAgtNo= '%s' and HTxnSt='S' and HRspcd='SC0000' and TXNSTS='S' and THDCHK in('Y','B') and ChkFlg='0'

DynSentence.name: QryYTKAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select sum(cast(TxnAmt as bigint)) as SumAmt,coalesce(COUNT(*),0) TotCnt from afetxnjnl where ActDat = '%s' and CAgtNo= '%s' and HTxnSt='S' and HRspcd='SC0000' and ThdChk IN ('G','F','D','E','Y','S') and ChkFlg='0'
